title: What is AI?
video_desc: Abstract visuals of interconnected nodes, data streams flowing, and a brain-like neural network animation.  Fast-paced and visually stimulating.
narration: "Ever wonder what AI is?  It's like giving computers a brain!  They learn from data, solve problems, and even make decisions – just like we do!"

title: AI in Action
video_desc: Quick cuts showing examples of AI in action: a smartphone displaying a virtual assistant, a person using a music streaming service, a self-driving car navigating a road.
narration: "AI is already all around us!  Think smart assistants, personalized recommendations, and even self-driving cars. It's changing how we live!"

title: The Future of AI
video_desc: Futuristic cityscape with flying vehicles and holographic displays.  Focus on positive and hopeful imagery.
narration: "The future of AI is bright!  Imagine a world with more automation, better healthcare, and solutions to some of our biggest challenges.  AI is paving the way."
